concept.title: Case 3: Policy based on type of Radio Network (for example, 3G, 4G, Fixed)

section.title: Overview
section.p: This use case demonstrates the ability of NCC to provide policy rules related to radio network.

ul.li: Simulate attachment for a device with RAT-Type = WLAN, then verify that NCC returns AMBR = 1000.
Simulate attachment for a device with RAT-Type = UTRAN, then verify that NCC returns AMBR = 200.

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

ol.li: Log in to the SM GUI and navigate to Subscriber Manager and select Devices tab. Click to create a device.
